I'm giving this a positive because it began such a great series but if you are going to buy this one buy L4D2 as well because this game is just not as polished, there are many issues with bot AI as well as issues with random intense frame drops after restarting a chapter.
The game is also considerably more difficult due not being able to abuse the L4D2 melee weapons, but that could also be one of the draws of the game as it isn't as easy as L4D2 and the way you play the game, even the L4D1 maps that exist in L4D2, is quite different due to the lack of L4D2 Special Infected.

Left 4 Dead is great, but I can't recommend it because Left 4 Dead 2 is better and contains all of the content that the original has and more.

I know this game is as old as they come, but they messed the survivor's AI up to the point where it is impossible to finish a campaign on the hardest difficulty in Single player.  Believe me, trying to do so is a waste of time, I just wasted 3-4 hours trying to let them redeem themselves and that is unfortuneately 3-4 hours I will never see again, all because I was too shorthanded... The AI would refuse to pick up first aid kits and would never watch my back which is unfortunate considering you have to lead them forward in order to progress.  The biggest loss in playing this game is that I know some lazy game developer cheated me out of whatever teensy amout of money my dumb ass spent on this game.
So many years and I still can't get enought of it <3

Решил написать отзыв, так как купил эту игру, ранее при этом в неё не играв, с надеждой на новые "старые" локации и сюжет, не использовавшийся во второй части. И какого же было моё удивление, когда я увидел, что игра состоит из тех же самых кампаний, только с ухудшеной графикой. Спрашивается, что же она до сих пор делает в стиме, да ещё и стоит четыре сотни, когда должна быть бесплатной, или же вовсе отсутствовать. Такое чувство, что её продают в надежде на людей, которые не знакомы с обеими частями, расчитывая на то, что кто- нить лоханётся. Поэтому, если у вас есть вторая часть, и вы не хотите выкинуть деньги на ветер, не покупайте эту игру! Да и тем, у кого нет ни одной из частей, я рекомендую покупать сразу вторую, поскольку в первой уже нет никакого смысла, когда есть игра с новыми и теми же старыми локациями, да и с улучшенной графой!

Is a decent game, has some errors both history and optimization, the scenarios are simple compared to the scenarios of left 4 dead 2, the multiplayer servers are almost empty and the ones that are fuller only has Russian players, does not have many campaigns And you can not install skins for weapons and characters, artificial intelligence of the bots is very bad, but despite all this, the game is very entertaining to play in a private game with friends, also has a very large replayability and you have The opportunity to install additional campaigns made by other users

I recommend this game to hang out with friends!

Is it worth buying Left 4 dead or should you just buy Left 4 dead 2?
Well, it all depends on what kind of person you are, and your personal preference.

Know that Left 4 dead 2 has all of the maps that Left 4 dead has, as well as all its new maps. Left 4 dead 2's multiplayer is infinitely more active than 1, but that's not to say 1's online is dead.

Although the old maps are in 2, the new zombies and weapons will also appear. This is a bit of an immersion-breaker for me, because those zombies weren't supposed to exist until L4D2. Playing with four weapon types and no melee weapons is a completely different experience than L4D2, and although I love the new weapons introduced in L4D2, especially the melee weapons, I think I actually prefer how the game feels with the streamlined weapon selection.

L4D2 has access to the workshop, but 1 has plenty more mods that you can access online. There are plenty of quality fan-made campaigns out there to download.

If you're thinking of buying both, I highly recommend buying both.
If you're going to buy one, buy L4D2.

Para quem é fã de Zumbis esse é o jogo, é um jogo que simula com muita classe e equilíbrio o que foi visto, por exemplo, em "O Despertar dos Mortos" ou sua refilmagem, "Madrugada dos Mortos", com o desespero de sobreviventes, homens e mulheres comuns, que se vêem em uma situação extraordinária e precisam trabalhar em equipe para se manterem inteiros. Com uma ótima mecânica e um sistema que gera inimigos de forma inteligente e dinâmica, é um jogo saboroso de jogar.
Excelente jogo, recomendo a todos.
